decks.notes: The deck focuses on using creatures with synergistic abilities to assemble powerful combinations on the battlefield. It utilizes cards like Chord of Calling and Summoner's Pact to search for specific creatures needed for the combo, while also including creatures like Nadu, Winged Wisdom and Springheart Nantuko to provide additional utility and value. The deck also includes lands like Urza's Saga and Boseiju, Who Endures to further support the creature toolbox strategy. By carefully tutoring for the right creatures and utilizing their abilities effectively, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents and secure victory.

This Jeskai Control deck focuses on control elements to disrupt the opponent's strategy while maintaining board presence and card advantage. It includes a mix of removal spells, counterspells, card draw, and powerful threats like Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury. The deck aims to control the game tempo, answer threats efficiently, and ultimately outvalue the opponent to secure victory. The mana base is optimized to support the deck's three-color requirements and includes utility lands like Arena of Glory to provide additional advantages in certain matchups.

This deck focuses on quickly building a strong board presence with efficient creatures and utilizing powerful spells to disrupt the opponent's game plan. The inclusion of Jegantha as a companion offers additional mana acceleration and flexibility. Aggressively pressuring the opponent with creatures like Amped Raptor and Phlage while controlling the board with removal like Fatal Push and Thoughtseize is key to overwhelming the opponent. The deck also has some prison elements with Static Prison to further disrupt the opponent's strategy. Overall, this deck aims to win through swift and aggressive plays.

The main objective of this deck is to establish control over the game by utilizing a diverse range of powerful cards that provide removal, card advantage, and board presence. Through a combination of powerful creatures like Omnath, Locus of Creation and Delighted Halfling, along with disruptive spells like Prismatic Ending and Solitude, the deck aims to outvalue and outmaneuver the opponent. The inclusion of cards like The One Ring and Leyline Binding provide additional utility and versatility, allowing the deck to adapt to various situations and counter opposing strategies effectively.

This deck focuses on assembling a combo using Underworld Breach and Grinding Station to repeatedly mill cards from the library and deal damage to the opponent. Emry, Lurker of the Loch is key in recurring artifacts from the graveyard, while Nadu, Winged Wisdom provides card draw and mana acceleration. The deck also includes disruptive spells like Unholy Heat and Malevolent Rumble to control the board. With the right pieces in play, the deck can quickly combo off and win the game in a single turn.
